__e: You get yourself all hopped up on Sex and the City and Bridget Jones and thinking that you need to have some big single experience. - Which, by the way, is total bullshit.
Come on. She'll go home, she'll watch Bridget Jones-something-asshole. She'll have a good cry, she'll be fine.
I, Bridget Jones, best mother will be in the world. I will try to remember you in a store ... or you stop a machine like that woman did with her cat.
